raw_input.text:
Clemenger BBDO has engaged Mia Garcia to provide services for the Show Time Signature Campaign on behalf of Show Time. As consumers increasingly seek sustainable products, Australians are seeking better retail solutions. As the campaign's subject matter expert, Mia Garcia will deliver key messages across media and social channels. This campaign strengthens the brand's position in retail.

INFLUENCER AGREEMENT

This agreement is between Show Time and the Influencer for Show Time Shopping Campaign 2025.

COMMERCIAL TERMS:
- Total Fee: $25,547 AUD (inclusive of GST)
- Payment Terms: Net 30 days from invoice date
- Invoice Requirements: Tax invoice required upon completion

DELIVERABLES:
- 3 x Instagram posts

TERMS AND CONDITIONS:
- Engagement Period: 6 months
- Exclusivity Period: 4 weeks
- Territory: Australia
- Usage Rights: 12 months from campaign launch
- Content Rights: Show Time retains full commercial rights

COMPLIANCE:
- All content must comply with ACMA guidelines and ASA codes
- Content is subject to client approval before publication
- Disclosure requirements must be met per ACCC guidelines

LEGAL:
This agreement is governed by Australian law and subject to the jurisdiction of Australian courts.

Agreed terms are subject to final contract execution.
